name: 莊欣慈
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week(s)	What a World 2 Listening / Reading
1	Orientation
2 - 3	Listening / Reading (Unit 9)
4 - 5	Listening / Reading (Unit 10)
6 - 7	Listening / Reading (Unit 11)
8	Listening / Reading (review) // Presentations
9	Midterm Examination
10 - 11	Listening / Reading (Unit 15)
12 - 13	Listening / Reading (Unit 16)
14 - 15	Listening / Reading (Unit 17)
16 - 17	Oral Presentations
18	Final Examination
scorePolicy:
上課出席 (如:上課活動、小組討論、筆記寫作、報告表現等)  50%
回家作業 (如:作文寫作、閱讀預習、小組共同作業等)  20%
期中全校英文會考成績  15%
期末全校英文會考成績  15%
materials:
��	What a World 2 Listening: Amazing Stories from Around the Globe. Broukal. (2011) (Pearson Education)
��	What a World 2 Reading: Amazing Stories from Around the Globe. Broukal. (2011) (Pearson Education)
